titleStmt.title: SII 7.485: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 485. (A.R. No. 269 of 1901). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE TYAGARAJASVAMIN TEMPLE AT TIRUVARUR, NEGAPATAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmaṉṉu patumam pūtta veḻulakun tāmuṉ cey tavattāl parutivaḻit toṉṟi neṭumā livaneṉac cuṭarmuṭi cūṭi Irunilamakaḷai Urimaiyiṟ puṇarntu tirumakaḷ paṇaimulaic ceñcān taḷaintu parumaṇi mārvam paṉivarai nikaṟpa jayamakaḷ ceḻuñcantaṉac cuvaṭṭāl puya mirukayilaip poruppeṉat tonṟi nāmakaḷ tāṉum Eṅkomakaḷ cevvāyp pavaḷacceyoḷip paṭaittaṉa niyāneṉat tavaḷanaṉṉiṟan taṉittoṭai pukaḻmakaḷ ḻunāḷilum Orukuṭai nilavum porupaṭait tikiri veyiluṅ karuṅkali Iruḷiṉait turappa niṭu pallūḻi Eḻkaṭaṟpuṟattiṉuṅ koṭāc centaṉi
kko liṉitulāva mīṉamuñ cilaiyuñ citaittu vāṉuyarp poṉṉeṭu meruvil puli viṟṟiruppa Umpariyāṉai Oreṭṭiṉukkun tampameṉṉat taṉittaṉi ticaitoṟum vicaiyastampam niṟppa pacipakaiyāṉatu titu nīṅka maṉṉuyir taḻaippa maṉuvāṟu viḷaṅka mātavar tavamu maṅkaiyar kaṟpum Ātiantaṇa rā kutik kaṉalu miteḻu koṇṭal vīcu taṇpuṉalu metiṉil vaḷaṉuñ cāti Oḻukkamum nīti Aṟamum piṟaḻātu nikaḻap pā ḷaikkaimāvu mallatu vaṉṟaḷaippaṭutal kaṉaviluṅ kāṇṭaṟ kariteṉa varuntip puṭaiyiṉum palveṟu puḷḷiṉu mallatu ciṟaiyeṉappaṭuta liṉṟi ni
ṟaiperuñ celvamo ṭavaṉivāḻap pallavar teluṅkar māḷuvar kaliṅkar kocalar kaṉṉaṭar kaṭārar teṉṉar ceralar ciṅkaṇar koṅkaṇar cetikar tirikattar vaṅka raṅkar vattavar mattirar kaṅkar coṉakar kaikaiyar jiṉareṉ ṟaṟaikaḻalventarum Allāvaraicarum muṟaimaiyil varinta tiṟai kuṇarn tiṟaiñca Ampoṉmalaṟ koṭic cempiyaṉkiḻānaṭi Orumaruṅ kuṭaṉamarn tiruppa Aruḷpuri cimaiyappoṟkoṭṭimaiyappāvaiyuñ civanumpolap puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷavan tirumaṇimārvat taruḷ muḻutuṭaiyāḷeṉa Uṭaṉiruppac cempoṉ vīrasiṅkājaṉattu puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum
vīṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirājakecaripaṉmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevarkku yāṇṭu 7Āvatu tiruvāruruṭaiyār śrīmulattāṉamuṭaiyār koyilil EḻuntaruḷiIrukkum Āḷuṭaiyanampikkum paravainācciyārkkum Aṟcaṉāpoka Iṟaiyiliyāka paḻampeyarum muṉ ṉiṟai kaṭṭinapaṭiyun tavirntu yāṇṭu 7vatu mutal Aṉapāyanallūreṉṉun tirunāmattāl Ōrurāyk kūṭiṉa keyamāṇikkavaḷanāṭṭu marukalnāṭṭut tiruvātiraimaṅkalam Eṟiṉa nilam Uṭpaṭa 2 + 1/2 + 1/160 + 1/320 x 1/2ṉāl 100 2ḷa � Ivvūroṭuṅkūṭa Oṭṭi Iṟuttu varukiṟa Āmur Eṟu nilam Uṭpaṭa 10 2 + 3/4 + 1/80 + 1/160 + 1/320 x 1/4ṉāl 5 100 10 1ḷa Āka

ṉāl ṭṭi 1 � nikki kācu 4 4 tirumaṭaippaḷḷikku viṟaku koḷḷa kācu 5 + 1/4 � vaḍa tiruppaḷḷinirpparavukkum tirunamanikaikku ti ṅkoḷḷa ciṟapput tirunāṭkaḷi leḻuntaruḷuvikkum śrīpātantāṅkuvārkku 10ḷ . hemasabhādhināthacaraṇannyāsollasanmastakaḥ . prādāT bhūmihiraṇyakaṃ sarajatānnanyānḍanāN sot=tamāN śrīyārūradhipasya mūlavasatau devonapāyo nṛpaḥ . 1 lakṣmyālaye racitadharmmaparānupāla
śīlānnṛpāṁghrikamalāṁcirasā namāmi . vyāghrāgrahāravarahemasabhānaṭeśapādāravindamadhupo hyanapāyanāmā ....2 Āḷuṭaiya nampi mātākkaḷ Icaiñāniyār ... jananī bhavato ñānaśivācārya kulebhavaT .
śaive gautamagotresmiN ñānyākhyā kamalāpure ....3
